website_summaries.verdict: In general, consumers gave high marks to the style and comfort level offered by the Nike Metcon DSX Flyknit 2. Though most users claimed that the fit was snug, many people complained of heel slippage during cross-training. But on the whole, the footwear received tons of praises for delivering a supportive and stable platform which accommodates dynamic movements.
pros: Numerous fitness aficionados recommended using the trainer for CrossFit and other high-intensity workouts because it felt supportive during explosive movements
Many users claimed that the sole unit delivered a stable base for weight training
The shoe was deemed comfortable when used for various types of activities, according to plenty of owners
Several testers stated that they liked the fit because it was snug but not restrictive
The lightweight nature of the product was praised by some wearers
The majority of consumers found the shoe to be stylish
cons: A good number of training enthusiasts complained of heel slipping out, which made the shoe unusable during workouts
Several gym-goers stated that this model was not as supportive as the other Metcons

customer_reviews.title: way better than reebok&UA product
customer_reviews.text: best training shoes I had so far! bought it for the looks but the steadness and lightweight are above my expectation, recommended to my other lifting friends as well. dont waste your money on reebok or UA, nike metcon is significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hu

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this product gets 2 stars is because it truly is made with good quality materials. HOWEVER, anyone without dainty skinny feet need to stay away from these particular metcon model. They are way too tight around the mid foot area where the laces would be, which speaking of laces, you don’t need them at all, but they give them to you anyways. Consider the standard Free x metcon 1 and the metcon sport instead.
customer_reviews.author: FaThor

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great once they loosen up, I took the laces out and now they are waaaaay comfortable. I like that I can just slip them on and go. They are not loose at all without the laces, I have 2 pair. I wear a US size 10 in woman's, but always buy an 8 in men's. I can wear them all day with no problem, but I don't think they give good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Dionysia Downs

customer_reviews.title: ... own all the metcon shoes and this is my favorite. It's more comfortable to run in but still ...
customer_reviews.text: I've own all the metcon shoes and this is my favorite. It's more comfortable to run in but still build for lifting and rope climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo T

customer_reviews.title: Stretch boot upper doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The look of this shoe is legit. The fit and feel of this shoe is legit. Nike is the best in whatever shoe game they get into to, but they didn’t quite get this one right. The fly kit construction combined with the boot-like stretch construction does not allow you to tighten the shoe down enough to keep your heel from coming out of the back of the shoe. There is no way this shoe would work for any kind of running activities or just moving in general.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable & runs small
customer_reviews.text: maybe i should have ordered a half size up, but it just was a very uncomfortable experience. felt like every step i took in these shoes would pull my socks down; I could feel my heel come up slightly out of the shoe every step. I may try a larger size, but i have a feeling that these shoes are just poorly designed/built.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I have found for comfort putting on
customer_reviews.text: with no tongue and an elastic like stretch, the tab on top and in the back make it easy, nice, and quick to put on every time. Took a week or so for the heel to conform to my foot, great grip but wont get pebbles stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect casual pair
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Perfect. They are sturdy, fashionable. The right color. We order this as a second pair to replace old ones (that lasted around 2-3 yes) Shoes give good support for walking/running / lifting
customer_reviews.author: Anilu

customer_reviews.title: Still a great sneaker for HITT classes
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these in 2017 and finally decided to upgrade and get a newer pair. They are great for HITT classes. I bought the latest version and they were so tight and narrow and not very nice looking. I’m glad I was able to find an “older version”. They still look great and I only use them for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: jovz NYC

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our son who has long, narrow feet. They fit perfectly. A great summer sneaker, I’m not sure about them in rainy weather as they’re material and could get wet. He says they are very comfortable and feel great and especially likes how they fit around the ankle. Very happy teenager! Just as advertised and arrived before promised!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kristan

customer_reviews.title: These Nikes are painfull.
customer_reviews.text: Really painfull. After 2 weeks the sides of these shoes are completely destroying my toes. They're gonna end up in the garbage. Expensive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lifting shoes
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves these. Had a pair before and was ready for a new one. Good grip. Good for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Heel slips up and down while walking.
customer_reviews.text: Even after wearing these shoes to the gym for a month they still slide up and down on my heel with every step no matter how tight I make them. As long as I'm standing still during lifting they are otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a half size Up
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these, got a half size bigger and it fits . Thankful I got them a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Prust

customer_reviews.title: Best all-in-one training shoes out there!
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded my expectations, especially the lateral roll stability. Great footwear for CrossFit and other intense workouts with a wide range of exercises from running and jumping to heavy weightlifting.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Munson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for your prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your prompt delivery. It took about 8 days to order and ship. I like the shoes very much and they fit well in size. I bought it as a present for my boyfriend and I think he will be very happy. One thing I'm sorry about is that I came without a Nike tag. I wonder if the brand tag was cut off. Thank you, Mr. Seller. Sell a lot.
customer_reviews.author: silvermouse

customer_reviews.title: Fashion
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shoe. He can wear it for workouts or just casual with a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jane I.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. More blue than purple. Lots of reflective bits.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: not true to size and seller will not exchange or refund dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all purpose shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Used for walking and General everyday shoe. All black looks great. It also works as a compression sock. Keeps foot swelling from happening. I do a lot walking both exercise and general use. This is my second pair. Great travel all around shoe. Very light.
customer_reviews.author: siberiof

customer_reviews.title: good experience
customer_reviews.text: excellent service and the product arrived as it was expected
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something minimal for the gym. I'm all about Nike so this was a no brainer. These are light and comfortable. I like how they look!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Im still waitin for the other pair for metcon 5 that i ordered same time i ordered this camou flyknit 3.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto M Sari Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for lifting
customer_reviews.text: I been working out with this shoe for about a week. There stable, provides great support while lifting heavy weights. Not much of a runner but I wouldn’t run in these not enough support for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size
customer_reviews.text: I like the pattern and I don't like the fitting around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, Stylish, and comfy.they provide a flat base perfect for powerlifting good grip and the snug comfy fit helps for runs as well. These shoes work great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: George Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow mid foot
customer_reviews.text: Too tight around the mid foot area... It was a battle just to get the shoe on. I can't even wear them with sox!!!! Any individual with wide feet stay away!!!! I will return them...
customer_reviews.author: Daimon Malachi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes, but would not recommend for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but definitely not a good shoes to be walking down a steep sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: The man

customer_reviews.title: So I just go barefoot in them and it’s solved and still comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They have the heel slip that you ready in a majority of the reviews. So I just go barefoot in them and it’s solved and still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Fam

customer_reviews.title: Crossfit
customer_reviews.text: I am a bigger guy who started crossfit and I love the shoes. Light weight but durable. Shoes have been comfortable right out of the box from jogging a mile to box jumps and squats.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunpop03

customer_reviews.title: Slides a bit but, stabilization is solid
customer_reviews.text: With the shoe being a sock fit it does tend to slide a bit on the heel... that being said there is more stabilization in this model than the previous with regards to lifting in the shoe. The seller made a potential bad experience into one of exception... would/will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the stability for power lifts and the flexibility for running short distances
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: You need these shoes. Buy them now.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look cool and fit great. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Just workout barefoot. It’d be the same. No cushion or support.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Loper

customer_reviews.title: Great ankle/arch support but still “low profile”
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! They give more than enough arch and ankle support. I do CrossFit and these are ideal for me. For those who like a “low profile” sneaker and still need more support than the Nike Flyknit 3.0/4.0s these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I’ve ever had. I love metcons, and this is the best version I’ve purchased, great for training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: Loss of compliments in a very nice walking shoe And the colors are just awesome
customer_reviews.author: Homer bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Fits well and very comfortable. Trust only the centimeter size fit and it will be a perfect fit everytime. Design is beautifully done.
customer_reviews.author: EdgeMax

customer_reviews.title: It Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product; however, may not be a great shoe for runs over 1 mile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Nike Metcons
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as the older metcons but still are pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: Tushar

customer_reviews.title: Took for ever
customer_reviews.text: A lot to break in on these shoes. Much better after breaking in
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good functional shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The sock-fit shoes are a little snug for my feet but it's nice to not have to tie you shoes sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike for Life
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes really durable I'm really comfortable made very well
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Morgan

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. But I've only worked twice since I received ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, so far so good. But I've only worked twice since I received them last Thursday....
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade for me
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is great, and true to size. Upgraded from the Metcon 4s. Using them exclusively for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: KeithB

customer_reviews.title: Feels like putting on a sock! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they fit.. nice and snug and offers great support..
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Mallak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked most: color scheme; could be better Liked least: Material feels a bit on the stiff side
customer_reviews.author: X

product_meta.title: Nike
product_meta.description: Men's Sport Shoes of the brand Nike. Model – Nike metcon DSX Flyknit 2
feature_bullets: Flyknit upper - provides a combo of flexibility, stability and durability while maintaining a cooler environment!
Proprioceptive collar - delivers a comfortable snug fit!
Molded flex grooves - provides a smooth natural range of motion with each stride!
Rubber side-grip - enhance your foot's grip for rope climbing!
